price: A onda bih one koji nisu vjerovali kaznom dohvatio, pa kakva je samo bila osuda Moja!
arabic: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma akhadhtu alladhīna kafarū fakayfa kāna nakīri
